raw: * Abstract base class for HTML based cell renderer.
* HTML cell renderer are used to construct an HTML string, which is used to
* render the cell.
* @require(qx.bom.Stylesheet)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Abstract base class for HTML based cell renderer. HTML cell renderer are used to construct an HTML string, which is used to render the cell.

raw: * Get the css classes for the cell
* @param value {var} The cell's data value
* @param states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
* @return {String} Space separated list of CSS classes

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the css classes for the cell

@param.name: @param
@param.body: states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
@param.description: A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} Space separated list of CSS classes
@return.description: Space separated list of CSS classes

raw: * Get the element attributes for the cell
* @param value {var} The cell's data value
* @param states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
* @return {String} Compiled string of cell attributes. e.g.
* 'tabIndex="1" readonly="false"'

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the element attributes for the cell

@param.name: @param
@param.body: states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
@param.description: A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} Compiled string of cell attributes. e.g. 'tabIndex="1" readonly="false"'
@return.description: Compiled string of cell attributes. e.g. 'tabIndex="1" readonly="false"'

raw: * Get the CSS styles for the cell
* @param value {var} The cell's data value
* @param states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
* @return {String} Compiled string of CSS styles. e.g.
* 'color="red; padding: 10px'

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the CSS styles for the cell

@param.name: @param
@param.body: states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
@param.description: A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} Compiled string of CSS styles. e.g. 'color="red; padding: 10px'
@return.description: Compiled string of CSS styles. e.g. 'color="red; padding: 10px'

raw: * Get the cell's insets. Insets are the sum of the cell's padding and
* border width.
* @param value {var} The cell's data value
* @param states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
* @return {Integer[]} An array containing the sum of horizontal insets at index
* 0 and the sum of vertical insets at index 1.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the cell's insets. Insets are the sum of the cell's padding and border width.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
@param.description: A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer[]} An array containing the sum of horizontal insets at index 0 and the sum of vertical insets at index 1.
@return.description: An array containing the sum of horizontal insets at index 0 and the sum of vertical insets at index 1.

raw: * Get cell'S HTML content
* @param value {var} The cell's data value
* @param states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
* @return {String} The cell's content as HTML fragment.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: states {Object} A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.
@param.description: A map containing the cell's state names as map keys.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The cell's content as HTML fragment.
@return.description: The cell's content as HTML fragment.
